xilinxFIFOsource
xilinxFIFObase
xilinxFIFOsource

Drive xilinx FIFO write interfaces

Variables
_signals
_signals

List of signals that are required

_optional_signals
_optional_signals

List of optional signals, these will never be required but will be used if found.

_run thread that deals with read and write queues.
